商品名稱: PRETTYGARDEN 女款 T 恤 夏季 休閒 圓領 蕾絲 鉤針 短袖 襯衫 可愛 印花 寬鬆 長版上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: Heart White Red
留言內容: Very pretty top nice material is light and then so it’ll be a great top for summer. My only complaint is that the sleeves kind of roll on the front part but I do have big arms and that is more than likely just a problem I’m gonna have to face other than that, I’d buy a whole bunch and every color I still may buy one or two but it’s loose fitting but not too baggy. Not very much stretch. With the size that Amazon said I should order and I have no complaints there. I really don’t think a smaller size would’ve satisfied. Me. Might’ve been snug in the wrong places so Going with Amazon‘s suggestion for size was the correct fit for me. I often have problems around the area because I have wide shoulders and I wear a 38B and bras so the girls aren’t very big. I’ve got a pretty good size circumference on my rib cage alone so if you’re more of an upside down triangle shape than a pear shape, you might want to go with amazons suggestion. I did buy this top on sale, but still completely recommended especially if you need something nice and cool, but still stay within the realm of business casual for work, this is a good top.

商品名稱: PRETTYGARDEN 女款 T 恤 夏季 休閒 圓領 蕾絲 鉤針 短袖 襯衫 可愛 印花 寬鬆 長版上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: Solid Black
留言內容: This is a cute top that has a looser fit, which is what I wanted. I feel it's true to size. The fabric is not quite what I expected; it's like a polyester blend without much give, but it looks very nice. The fabric feels like it will be breathable and good for summer.

商品名稱: PRETTYGARDEN 女款 T 恤 夏季 休閒 圓領 蕾絲 鉤針 短袖 襯衫 可愛 印花 寬鬆 長版上衣
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: Solid Bright Blue
留言內容: This top is so perfect! The flutter sleeves make it dressy but it’s so comfortable that it feels casual. The fabric is great because it is a bit textured in a way that makes it where you never have to iron it. The fit is true to size and so flattering. I have a large chest and am a bit heavy (5’6” 220lbs) and the XXL was perfect. I ended up ordering 4 colors. Really a beautiful top!

商品名稱: PRETTYGARDEN 女款 T 恤 夏季 休閒 圓領 蕾絲 鉤針 短袖 襯衫 可愛 印花 寬鬆 長版上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: Heart White Red
留言內容: This is a really lovely top. I got it in the heart print and was hoping to buy other colors. The material is nice… not that clingy, stretchy material that pills. The sleeve detail is so pretty. It is loose fitting but not baggy. Unfortunately I have to return because of the length. This barely reaches the top of my mid-rise jeans when I am standing with my arms down.

商品名稱: PRETTYGARDEN 女款 T 恤 夏季 休閒 圓領 蕾絲 鉤針 短袖 襯衫 可愛 印花 寬鬆 長版上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: A-dot White Pink
留言內容: The shirt was great! Exactly as expected, but it is NOT stretchy. Make sure you take that into consideration when you do your sizing. The description does not say that it is stretchy, so I wasn't expecting it to be, but be mindful before ordering if you are used to some stretch in your clothes.However, the way my shirt came to me was horrendous. There was nothing wrong with the shirt, I want to emphasize that, but the shirt came in the ziploc bag that it is stored in, in the amazon warehouse. No box, no mailer, no envelope, nothing. Just the ziploc bag with the mailing sticker slapped on the front. There wasn't even a piece of tape over the bag to keep someone from just unzipping the pouch and removing or adding to the contents of the bag. This is the second time this has happened to me in the last week, and each item came from separate Amazon warehouses, so different people decided that was the best way to send an item through the mail. I did not give the shirt a bad star rating, because it really is a good item, but Amazon really needs to do better on their packaging.

SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: Heart White Black
留言內容: Average shirt, Its boxy, has no give and no shape to it.  If you have larger boobs like me it will just look like a square on you because it falls in the same line as your chest with zero shaping.  I can't wear it with a skirt for example.  I kept because I needed a semi casual, semi nice shirt on shirt notice for an outing and I was able to draw in and tuck in the front to my jeans to give it a little bit of shape, but it would not stay tucked due to the no give, no stretch fabric.  Like chiffon but not real chiffon.
